title: Bottom microphone does not work, only top microphone.
content:
So I got this Pixel 2 XL for less than a month ago and now I can not use the bottom microphone.
I cannot use Ok Google
I cannot make phone calls with normal earpiece, only with the speaker on
I can still record videos but only the top microphone works

Is this supposed to happen so quick? Any advice for the next thing that I should do?
